attributes.title: Racist app
attributes.review: I open this app to see a big fat ugly Chetto 🤢🤮 not only that but very racist and offensive content. This app is the worst app ever created. I can’t believe Apple would let this god awful app to be put on their play store

attributes.title: bees??
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and IMMEDIATELY my house was swarmed with bees in tiny red MAGA hats?? i’ve been stuck inside for 3 days. they’ve started cracking one of the windows & i fear soon they’ll make their way inside. please send help

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app it made my phone, computer, and my entire router malfunction. It was absolutely ridiculous. 

ps: black lives matter, my body my choice🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: ✨ d i s g u s t i n g ✨
attributes.review: as a person with no expectations for this is it was literally horrendous. A big fat Cheeto popped up as I opened the app that it cracked my screen. With that my dog chewed it up and threw up Cheeto color. 0/10 would not recommend.

attributes.title: Worst app ever downloaded
attributes.review: Glitchy and doesn’t work. Also somehow hacked into my Fortnite mobile account and stole all my v-bucks after stealing all the data off of my phone.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i literally downloaded the app and it automatically hacked all my social medias with a picture of a naked fat cheeto!!! My family saw the picture and is taking me to therapy because i’m traumatized for life.. and also BLM.

attributes.title: No hun👁👄👁
attributes.review: My pet alien went into the living room while I was watching tiktok and he screamed because he saw none other than the hot Cheeto himself and joe Biden working out!!! It was was sweaty and disgusting!! I never wanna see those ashy elbows again!!!!! Ewwwwww.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE
attributes.review: Dang I’ve never been so disappointed in an app. I thought I would get updates on how to help our bunker boy in the upcoming election. Instead I have been scarred by the horrors or that Cheeto dust covered man. Please remove this app. Thank you.

attributes.title: ✨Absolute Garbage✨
attributes.review: Never in my entire life have I used an THIS terrible. You would think with a Net Worth of 2.1 Billion, the campaign team could design a better app. Or pick a better candidate.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app was honestly so difficult to use. Such a disappointment. I do not recommend ANYONE getting this app. Do yourself a favor and save your time, this app is absolute trash.
